system.effect:
Character can make a Fient Action as a Free Action when also making an Unarmed All-Out Attack or Standard Attack Action.
Additionally, they make Unarmed Called Shot Actions as Half Actions.

description.value: Character can make a Fient Action as a Free Action when also making an Unarmed All-Out Attack or Standard Attack Action. Additionally, they make Unarmed Called Shot Actions as Half Actions.
